thread.title: MELNER R BOND III
thread.title_full: Laguna Pearl reviewed by MELNER R BOND III

author: MELNER R BOND III
title: MELNER R BOND III
text: My wife spent several weeks trying to decide exactly what she wanted in a pearl necklace. Meanwhile, I researched where to buy this precious gift that will one day below to her daughters or grand daughters. After I settled on Laguna Pearl and she selected the length, quality and color she wanted, we placed the order. While waiting, my wife showed that she was very excited and her expectations were high. I spent that time hoping I had made a good decision with Laguna Pearl. Wow! Both of us are extremely happy with her necklace! The pearls are better than I had hoped and she won't stop wearing them! Thanks, Laguna Pearl, for making me look good!
